significant_actions.summary: New tariffs imposed to counter perceived threats from Russia, increasing costs for imported products from Russia.
significant_actions.affected: Products imported from Russia

significant_actions.summary: Tariffs adjusted on imports of semiconductors and related equipment to protect domestic industries and address trade imbalances.
significant_actions.affected: Semiconductors and semiconductor manufacturing equipment

significant_actions.summary: Tariff changes on processed critical minerals to secure supply chains and support national security interests.
significant_actions.affected: Processed critical minerals and derivative products

significant_actions.summary: Adjustments on timber and lumber imports to reflect environmental concerns and protect domestic forestry jobs.
significant_actions.affected: Timber, lumber, and their derivative products

significant_actions.summary: Implementation of a new trade agreement with Israel to enhance agricultural trade, reducing tariffs on certain products.
significant_actions.affected: Agricultural products from the United States and Israel

significant_actions.summary: Revisions of tariffs on Brazilian imports to address economic or trade concerns, impacting import costs from Brazil.
significant_actions.affected: Products imported from Brazil

significant_actions.summary: Changes to reciprocal tariffs on select agricultural products to foster fairer trade practices.
significant_actions.affected: Certain agricultural products

significant_actions.summary: Tariff adjustments aligned with ongoing trade agreements with China to enhance economic cooperation.
significant_actions.affected: Various products traded between the United States and China

significant_actions.summary: Alterations to tariffs focusing on the synthetic opioid supply chain with China to curb illicit drug trafficking.
significant_actions.affected: Synthetic opioids and related products from China

significant_actions.summary: Tariff adjustment on medium to heavy vehicles and parts to support domestic manufacturers and address trade imbalances.
significant_actions.affected: Medium- and heavy-duty vehicles, vehicle parts, and buses

significant_actions.summary: Adjustments in tariffs on timber and lumber based on market demands and sustainable trade practices.
significant_actions.affected: Timber, lumber, and their derivative products

significant_actions.summary: Revised reciprocal tariffs and established procedures for implementing trade and security measures.
significant_actions.affected: Various products impacted by trade and security agreements

significant_actions.summary: Further updates to tariff rates reflecting discussions with China, potentially impacting import costs.
significant_actions.affected: Various products exchanged between the United States and China

significant_actions.summary: Further modification of existing reciprocal tariff rates across various products to align with ongoing trade dialogues.
significant_actions.affected: Numerous products across multiple sectors

significant_actions.summary: Adjustment in duties aimed at controlling the flow of illicit drugs across the northern border, impacting implicated goods.
significant_actions.affected: Illicit drugs and related products

significant_actions.summary: Suspension of the duty-free de minimis threshold, affecting small-value imports that previously enjoyed tax exemptions.
significant_actions.affected: All small-value imports from all countries

significant_actions.summary: Tariff changes on copper imports to protect domestic industries and address surplus import issues.
significant_actions.affected: Copper and copper products

significant_actions.summary: Extension of previous modifications in reciprocal tariff rates to continue fostering international trade relations.
significant_actions.affected: Various products subject to reciprocal tariffs

significant_actions.summary: Adjustments to tariffs on aluminum and steel to stabilize the domestic market and support manufacturers.
significant_actions.affected: Aluminum and steel imports

significant_actions.summary: Recognition of the significance of international trade on the U.S. economy during the annual World Trade Week.
significant_actions.affected: General acknowledgment, no specific products
